title: Customer schema
description: This is a schema that contains information about the customer: first name, phone, birth date, device data

age.title: Age
age.description: Customer`s age, which calculates by the system, based on birthday date

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Customer`s phone number which he uses to restore his pin

email.title: Email
email.description: Customer`s email, which uses for email notifications and special offers

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: Contains information about all customer devices
